org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors
Class Heartbeat

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors.Heartbeat
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.cougaar.core.relay.Relay, org.cougaar.core.relay.Relay.Source, org.cougaar.core.relay.Relay.Target, java.io.Serializable, org.cougaar.core.util.UniqueObject, org.cougaar.core.util.XMLizable
public class Heartbeat
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.cougaar.core.relay.Relay.Source, org.cougaar.core.relay.Relay.Target, org.cougaar.core.util.XMLizable

A Heartbeat Relay, the Blackboard object that is generated by the HeartbeatServerPlugin in response to a HbReq from the HeartbeatRequesterPlugin.
